transcript.text: here is a brief summary of Edward S
Herman and N chomsky's manufacturing
consent one of the first ideas mentioned
in this book was the consolidation of
many different individual media
companies into larger and larger

little bit the history of it another
really interesting point was the
influence that marketers have in
subsidizing media costs which then in

really useful was models of propaganda
he talks about the use of partial truths
to justify ideological lenses
for example saying that extremists kill

those extremists
